mapper.select: SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMemberById() */ A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , A.PWD , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE_NO , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.BLACK_REASON , A.BLACKLIST_YN , A.WITHDRAW_YN , A.BIRTH , A.ROLE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.BLACKLIST_YN = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ id }

SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMemberByEmail() */ A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , A.PWD , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE_NO , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.BLACK_REASON , A.BLACKLIST_YN , A.WITHDRAW_YN , A.BIRTH , A.ROLE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.BLACKLIST_YN = 'N' AND A.EMAIL = #{ email }
